name: Slides
tagline: Shared presentations for reuse and collaboration done by eZ Systems, eZ Partners and the greater eZ Community
body: ### Welcome to Slides for eZ Talks This [repository](https://github.com/ezsystems/slides) contains slides used for presentations/talks about [eZ Systems](http://ez.no), eZ Publish, eZ Platform and eZ Studio. Given they are hosted on Github, they are mostly technical by nature and produced by eZ Systems (Engineering, Professional Services, Product Management, ..), [Partners](http://ez.no/Partners/Find-a-Partner) and [Community](http://share.ez.no). ### Slides TODO: Add slides #### Links to older slides on eZ topics: - [Jérôme Vieilledent's Github pages](http://lolautruche.github.io/) - [Going crazy with HTTP caching - SymfonyLive Paris 2015](http://lolautruche.github.io/ez/going-crazy-with-caching.html) - Étendre Symfony, les bonnes pratiques - SymfonyLive Paris 2014 (French) - [Demystify migration to eZ 5.x - eZ Days Oslo 2014](http://lolautruche.github.io/ez/ez-migration.html) - [eZ Publish 5 and Backwards Compatibility - eZ Summer Camp 2013](http://lolautruche.github.io/ez/bc.html) - [eZ Publish 5 Cache unleashed - eZ Summer Camp 2013](http://lolautruche.github.io/ez/cache.html) - [Damien Pobel's Github pages](http://dpobel.github.io/) - Platform UI - eZ Lyon Meetup January 2015 *French* - [eZ Publish Public API workshop - eZ Summer Camp 2013](http://dpobel.github.io/slides-ez/public-api.html) - [eZ Publish REST API workshop - eZ Summer Camp 2013](http://dpobel.github.io/slides-ez/rest-api.html) - Patrick Allaert: - Create eZ 5.x Site from scratch in 45 min *French* ### Contribution Everyone is welcome to work together on contributing talks, improving existing once, or otherwise contribute changes/additions to any meta information in this [repository](https://github.com/ezsystems/slides). Things to keep in mind: - Attributions in slides are mainly reserved for the original creator(s)/speaker(s), always link to github history of slide set. In case of big changes by other contributor(s), it is best to remove inline attribution in slides and just link to Github history for attribution info. - It is strongly preferred that slides in this repository is in reveal.js format or similar *(in a open html/md format cable of being hosted by github pages and worked on efficiently using github)*, binary formats should not be hosted here. - If possible use CDN hosted versions of libraries and images, there is no desire to host several versions of any kind of javascript library in here - Take care about checking copyright of content when contributing, including images, videos, git animations and copy past of text. If you detect copyright issues please open a pull request to fix it. eZ Systems AS is not deemed responsible for copyrighted content wrongly used in any of the materials found in this repository. ### Copyright and License Content in this slides repository is unless otherwise noted provided under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. For copyright/license of images, see Contribution section.
